comments:
Build: 
LogAnalyzer.win32.win32.x86-TPTP-4.4.0-200706140100B

1. Try to import a log from a remote host that does not have AgentController running.

Problem:
There will be an exception.  A proper error message should be displayed instead of the exception.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.tptp.platform.common 1 0 2007-06-21 15:41:51.843
!MESSAGE java.lang.Exception
!STACK 0
java.lang.Exception
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.importFromRemoteHost(ImportLogWizard.java:2003)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.importLog(ImportLogWizard.java:1843)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.run(ImportLogWizard.java:305)
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:67)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.performFinish(ImportLogWizard.java:226)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.finishPressed(WizardDialog.java:742)
	at org.eclipse.jface.wizard.WizardDialog.buttonPressed(WizardDialog.java:373)
Raising priority as this should be addressed.

I believe this is the same problem as reported in 175768 except it is the RCP case.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 175768 ***
